Description: Spacious 4BR apartment for rent in the heart of Inman Square- Just a 5 minute walk to central square! Bus stop directly in front of building with close proximity to mass transportation (Harvard/Central) This unit features hardwood flooring. An eat in kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher! Windows to allow for natural light. 4BR with common living area. Available 9/1/23!
